Package edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.curve

Classes to express geometric curves of various sizes and shapes, including timing and interpolations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IndexWrapMode
    Interface to manage appropriate wrapping, clamping, etc behavior for indexing-based behavior.
    Interpolation<T>
    Interpolation strategy interface.
    SplineTimingHandler
    Interface to handle the conversion from a spline's global time space to the space of one of its spans.
    TimeWrapMode
    Interface to manage appropriate wrapping, clamping, etc behavior for indexing-based behavior.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdaptedPointStream<A,B>
    PointStream which converts a PointStream<A> to a PointStream<B> using an adapter strategy.
    ArbitraryTiming
    TimingHandler which permits arbitrary durations for each span.
    ArrayPointStream<P>
    Point-stream backed by an array for quick indexing.
    Curve<T>
    Abstract class for sampling generic parametric curves.
    PointStream<P>
    Abstract representation of a relative-indexable stream of generic points.
    SpanTime
    Information holder for storing a time parameter along a particular span of a spline.
    SplineCurve<P>
    Represents a parametric spline of points.
    UniformTiming
    TimingHandler which treats all spans in a spline as having the same duration.

Package edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.math.curve Description

Classes to express geometric curves of various sizes and shapes, including timing and interpolations.
